Description: Evaluate the security requirements to identify the roles necessary to address them effectively.
Incorporate security considerations as a fundamental aspect of the cloud adoption strategy.
Create cloud adoption plans that integrate security measures and practices.
Establish a cloud foundation with security controls implemented and ready for operation.
Deploy workloads with cloud security measures implemented to ensure a secure environment.
Establish robust security governance controls to ensure ongoing compliance.
Optimize security operations (SecOps and DevSecOps) by implementing efficient tools and practices.
